snippet.title: Yacht Mechanic Simulator - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Add do #Steam wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/

Build your own yacht empire! Find old yachts, patch their hulls, fix their engines, and add new parts. Design and install beautiful interiors of your vessels. Pilot your ships and check how they handle in the water. Sell your yacht, earn money, and become a millionaire!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1263620/Yacht_Mechanic_Simulator/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Yacht-Mechanic-Simulator-112720407022832
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/yachtmechanicsimulator/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/yacht_mechanic
WWW: http://imagepower.pl/en/home/
